I'm *SOOOO* thankful, I could kiss you, Barb!!  I was already 
dreading having to learn how to futz with the Netscape/IE dimension.  
Nice to know they're getting along.

Corrections have been made (thanks to some of you guys catching them 
for me), additions (new Mibugishiden shots and some RK manga images 
are up) and links corrected/added (Black Faery's RK screencap site 
and Kevin's bakumatsu site --- thanks Kevin!!)

My apologies to you PMK fans out there... I slept most of the day 
away & never got around to emailing people about getting scans & 
screencaps.  It'll get done soon.

It'll be a work in progress for some time, so come by & check it out 
occasionally.  Donations always welcome.  (Where's my Saitou beer???)

phil
